channel.title: Members items
channel.description: hey in my server i can't make anyone member so i need to know how to make members items non members. thanks to anyone who helps :)

item.title: Members items
item.dc:creator: @i_lured_i i lured i
item.description:
@i_lured_i wrote:

I know how to make them members if you still need it.

Read full topic

item.title: Members items
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

you have to make a void or boolean for it…

example

public boolean ismember();
character-is member == 1

public boolean notmember();
character-ismember == 0

if you use that exact thing, its definately not going to work, but if you know where im headed, then it will.

Read full topic

item.title: Members items
item.dc:creator: @sickamore sickamore
item.description:
@sickamore wrote:

no…look i made portal non member, it’s the items you have to be a member to put them on.

Read full topic

item.title: Members items
item.dc:creator: @chris_lol chris lol
item.description:
@chris_lol wrote:

so you need to make OBJECTS nonmember. not ITEMS. be more clear in your questions. andi have no idea. try finding the portals code in your client and find where is says something about member and change the one to a 0.

Read full topic

item.title: Members items
item.dc:creator: @chris_lol chris lol
item.description:
@chris_lol wrote:

well i dont know how to make tiems f2p, but to change if a players member, well… ill just give you an example.

go into your charicters file or whatever, and find the username you want to make member, open up the file and change what ive pointed out below.

[ACCOUNT]
character-username = abigfatcat
character-password = 37-94-248-96-43-227-144-145-68-49-20-99-44-211-61-132

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3250
character-posy = 3435
character-rights = 0
character-ismember = 1 <— CHANGE THE NUMBER TO 1 FOR MEMBER OR 0 FOR NONMEMBER //////LOOK HERE///////@!@!@!@!!@!@!@!@!@
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = 216.232.238.241
character-lastlogin = 20080601
character-energy = 100
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 7682

[EQUIPMENT]
character-equip = 0 3385 0
character-equip = 1 1052 0
character-equip = 2 1712 0
character-equip = 3 4675 0
character-equip = 4 3387 0
character-equip = 5 2890 0
character-equip = 6 -1 0
character-equip = 7 3389 0
character-equip = 8 -1 0
character-equip = 9 3391 0
character-equip = 10 3393 0
character-equip = 11 -1 0
character-equip = 12 -1 0
character-equip = 13 -1 0

[LOOK]
character-look = 0 0
character-look = 1 7
character-look = 2 8
character-look = 3 9
character-look = 4 5
character-look = 5 0

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0 77 778204
character-skill = 1 80 1001100
character-skill = 2 81 1109250
character-skill = 3 51 17400201
character-skill = 4 1 0
character-skill = 5 1 0
character-skill = 6 1 0
character-skill = 7 1 0
character-skill = 8 1 0
character-skill = 9 1 0
character-skill = 10 1 0
character-skill = 11 1 0
character-skill = 12 1 0

character-skill = 14 1 0

character-skill = 16 1 0
character-skill = 17 1 0
character-skill = 18 92 3535500
character-skill = 19 1 0
character-skill = 20 1 0

character-skill = 22 1 0
character-skill = 23 1 0

[ITEMS]
